title: Karlach

how to romance karlach in bg3
content:
m camp location so he can kidnap Astarion With a Surrendered Hag Ethel choose the gift of power and let her take Mayrina

Use Illithid powers on Flind to force her to attack her pack After Battle with the Gnoll Tribe and if you managed to Mind Control and she survives the battle, Convince the Flind to eat herself Refuse to help search for Duke Ravenguard Kill Rugan in the Zhentarim Hideout

Boo Volo during his performance With Tracker Grikka tell "I can get info out of the prisoner" Kiss Novice
